Update the basic product data in the VTEX Ads catalog.

>⚠️ For each batch insert/update, a maximum of 500 objects per request and 3 simultaneous requests are allowed.

Export information from all advertisers associated with a publisher account. Data is returned in JSON format by default, but can be exported as XLSX by adding the `download=true` parameter.

>ℹ️ Only available in publisher view. For more information about report export functionality, see [Exporting ads reports](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/exporting-ads-reports).

>⚠️ Export availability may be restricted based on the account type associated with the authentication. Not all users will have access to all available reports.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Metrics start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
(Required) Metrics end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
If true, includes detailed account information in the result.
Page number of results.
Number of items per page.
If true, returns the total number of available records.
If true, returns an XLSX file buffer ready for download instead of JSON.
(Required) HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Webhook to notify VTEX Ads about the final status of a transfer. The marketplace must consume this webhook to update transfer status.

## Authentication

This endpoint requires `x-api-key` and `x-secret-key` headers for authentication.

## Retry Logic

In case of webhook call failure, the marketplace should retry the request.

Generate a single sign-on redirect URL that allows users to switch between environments without having to log in again. The purpose of Single Sign On is to enable seamless user authentication across marketplace and VTEX Ads environments.

## Usage Flow

1. **Request redirect URL**: Call this endpoint with seller and user information
2. **User redirection**: Redirect the user to the returned `url_redirect`
3. **Automatic login**: The user will be automatically logged into VTEX Ads platform

>ℹ️ For more information about SSO implementation, see [VTEX Ads Single Sign On (SSO)](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/vtex-ads-single-sign-on-sso).

## Authentication

This endpoint uses `x-api-key` and `x-app-id` headers for authentication.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Type of the content being sent.
(Required) HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

VTEX Ads API enables merchants and marketplace operators to manage advertising campaigns, track ad performance, and synchronize product catalogs within the VTEX Ads platform.

This specification includes both VTEX Ads-hosted endpoints and marketplace-hosted endpoints that must be implemented by external marketplaces for complete integration.

This API is primarily used by:
- Store developers
- Marketplace operators
- Integration partners
- Advertising platform providers

With this API you can:
- Synchronize product catalog information for advertising
- Track ad impressions, clicks, and views
- Monitor conversion events and campaign performance
- Manage ad inventory and placements
- Handle credit transfers and balance inquiries
- Implement SSO authentication flows
- Export comprehensive reports in JSON or XLSX formats

>ℹ️ Learn more about [VTEX Ads](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides) and [Integrating VTEX Ads with external marketplaces](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/integrating-vtex-ads-with-external-marketplaces).

## Before you begin

- For bulk operations (product and inventory updates), there is a limit of 500 objects per request and 3 simultaneous requests.
- The event URLs for tracking impressions, clicks and views must not be constructed manually — always use the URLs provided from `POST` [Get ads](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/v1/rma/-publisher_id-).
- Authentication is required using `X-App-Id` and `X-Api-Key` headers. Contact [our support](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-does-vtex-support-work--2eAT5EyOvaLoHdIWDVaxC3) to obtain these credentials.
- Some endpoints marked with `{marketplaceEndpoint}` must be implemented by the external marketplace, not VTEX Ads.

## Index

### Catalog synchronization
- `POST` [Synchronize product information](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/product/bulk/products)
- `POST` [Synchronize inventory information](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/product/bulk/inventories)

### Ads events notification
- `POST` [Track ad impressions](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/v1/beacon/impression/-ad_id-)
- `POST` [Track ad clicks](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/v1/beacon/click/-ad_id-)
- `POST` [Track ad views](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/v1/beacon/view/-ad_id-)
- `POST` [Track conversions](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/v1/beacon/conversion)

### Ads
- `POST` [Get ads](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/v1/rma/-publisher_id-)

### Reports
- `GET` [Export advertisers report](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/report/v2/advertisers)
- `GET` [Export publishers report](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/report/v2/publishers)
- `GET` [Export network publishers report](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/report/network/publishers)
- `GET` [Export campaigns report](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/campaign/v2)
- `GET` [Export ads report](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/ad/results/v2)

### Marketplace Integration
- `POST` [Request SSO redirect URL](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/api/v1/sso/marketplace)
- `GET` [Search catalog products](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/search) (Marketplace endpoint)
- `GET` [Check credits balance](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/api/v1/checking_account) (Marketplace endpoint)
- `POST` [Request credits transfer](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#post-/api/v1/checking_account/transfer) (Marketplace endpoint)
- `GET` [Get user information](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/users/-user_id-) (Marketplace endpoint)
- `GET` [Get seller information](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/vtex-ads-api#get-/sellers/-seller_id-) (Marketplace endpoint)

| Parameter name | Description | Type |
| - | - | - |
| `X-App-Id` | Publisher App ID for authorization | Authentication header |
| `X-Api-Key` | API Key for authentication | Authentication header |
| `Content-Type` | Type of the content being sent | Request header |
| `Accept` | HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header | Request header |
